description: A method within Microsoft Edge to determine the browser version, essential for verifying if the latest security updates are applied. Users can check the version by clicking on the three dots in the upper right corner of the browser. After that, navigate to 'Help and feedback' and then select 'About Microsoft Edge'. This menu provides the current version number and checks for any available updates. Keeping the browser updated is crucial to mitigate vulnerabilities like CVE-2023-6345.
